com.vaadin.polymer.PolymerWidget

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.app.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.app.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AppBox
      app-box is a container element that can have scroll effects - visual effects based on
      scroll position.
      class  AppDrawer
      app-drawer is a navigation drawer that can slide in from the left or right.
      class  AppDrawerLayout
      app-drawer-layout is a wrapper element that positions an app-drawer and other content.
      class  AppGrid
      app-grid is a helper class useful for creating responsive, fluid grid layouts using custom properties.
      Because custom properties can be defined inside a @media rule, you can customize the grid layout
      for different responsive breakpoints.
      class  AppHeader
      app-header is container element for app-toolbars at the top of the screen that can have scroll
      effects.
      class  AppHeaderLayout
      app-header-layout is a wrapper element that positions an app-header and other content.
      class  AppLocation
      app-location is an element that provides synchronization between the
      browser location bar and the state of an app.
      class  AppPouchdbConflictResolution
      app-pouchdb-conflict-resolution enables declarative configuration of conflict
      resolution strategies ordered by logical relationships in the DOM.
      class  AppPouchdbDocument
      app-pouchdb-document is an implementation of Polymer.AppStorageBehavior
      for reading and writing to individual PouchDB documents.
      class  AppPouchdbQuery
      app-pouchdb-query allows for declarative, read-only querying into a PouchDB
      database.
      class  AppPouchdbSync
      app-pouchdb-sync arranges for one-directional or bi-directional
      synchronization between two PouchDB databases.
      class  AppRoute
      app-route is an element that enables declarative, self-describing routing
      for a web app.
      class  AppRouteConverter
      app-route-converter provides a means to convert a path and query
      parameters into a route object and vice versa.
      class  AppScrollposControl
      app-scrollpos-control is a manager for saving and restoring the scroll position when multiple
      pages are sharing the same document scroller.
      class  AppToolbar
      app-toolbar is a horizontal toolbar containing items that can be used for
      label, navigation, search and actions.

      class  HydrolysisAnalyzer 

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.iron.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DemoSnippet
      demo-snippet is a helper element that displays the source of a code snippet and
      its rendered demo.
      class  IronA11yAnnouncer
      iron-a11y-announcer is a singleton element that is intended to add a11y
      to features that require on-demand announcement from screen readers.
      class  IronA11yKeys
      iron-a11y-keys provides a cross-browser interface for processing
      keyboard commands.
      class  IronAjax
      The iron-ajax element exposes network request functionality.
      class  IronAutogrowTextarea
      iron-autogrow-textarea is an element containing a textarea that grows in height as more
      lines of input are entered.
      class  IronCollapse
      iron-collapse creates a collapsible block of content.
      class  IronComponentPage
      Loads Polymer element and behavior documentation using
      Hydrolysis and renders a complete
      documentation page including demos (if available).
      class  IronDocProperty
      Renders documentation describing a specific property of an element.
      class  IronDocViewer
      Renders documentation describing an element’s API.
      class  IronDropdown
      <iron-dropdown> is a generalized element that is useful when you have
      hidden content (.dropdown-content) that is revealed due to some change in
      state that should cause it to do so.
      class  IronFlexLayout
      The <iron-flex-layout> component provides simple ways to use
      CSS flexible box layout,
      also known as flexbox.
      class  IronForm
      <iron-form> is an HTML <form> element that can validate and submit any custom
      elements that implement Polymer.IronFormElementBehavior, as well as any
      native HTML elements.
      class  IronIcon
      The iron-icon element displays an icon.
      class  IronIcons
      iron-icons is a utility import that includes the definition for the iron-icon element, iron-iconset-svg element, as well as an import for the default icon set.
      class  IronIconset
      The iron-iconset element allows users to define their own icon set using
      an image file.
      class  IronIconsetSvg
      The iron-iconset-svg element allows users to define their own icon sets
      that contain svg icons.
      class  IronImage
      iron-image is an element for displaying an image that provides useful sizing and
      preloading options not found on the standard <img> tag.
      class  IronInput
      <iron-input> adds two-way binding and custom validators using Polymer.IronValidatorBehavior
      to <input>.
      class  IronLabel
      <iron-label> provides a version of the <label> element that works with Custom Elements as well as native elements.
      class  IronList
      iron-list displays a virtual, ‘infinite’ list.
      class  IronLocalstorage
      Element access to Web Storage API (window.localStorage).
      class  IronLocation
      The iron-location element manages binding to and from the current URL.
      class  IronMediaQuery
      iron-media-query can be used to data bind to a CSS media query.
      The query property is a bare CSS media query.
      The query-matches property is a boolean representing whether the page matches that media query.
      class  IronMeta
      iron-meta is a generic element you can use for sharing information across the DOM tree.
      It uses monostate pattern such that any
      instance of iron-meta has access to the shared
      information.
      class  IronMetaQuery
      iron-meta is a generic element you can use for sharing information across the DOM tree.
      It uses monostate pattern such that any
      instance of iron-meta has access to the shared
      information.
      class  IronOverlayBackdrop
      iron-overlay-backdrop is a backdrop used by Polymer.IronOverlayBehavior.
      class  IronPages
      iron-pages is used to select one of its children to show.
      class  IronQueryParams 
      class  IronRequest
      iron-request can be used to perform XMLHttpRequests.
      class  IronScrollThreshold
      iron-scroll-threshold is a utility element that listens for scroll events from a
      scrollable region and fires events to indicate when the scroller has reached a pre-defined
      limit, specified in pixels from the upper and lower bounds of the scrollable region.
      This element may wrap a scrollable region and will listen for scroll events bubbling
      through it from its children.
      class  IronSelector
      iron-selector is an element which can be used to manage a list of elements
      that can be selected.
      class  IronSignals
      iron-signals provides basic publish-subscribe functionality.
      class  IronSwipeableContainer
      <iron-swipeable-container> is a container that allows any of its nested
      children (native or custom elements) to be swiped away.
      class  UrlBar
      url-bar is a helper element that displays a simple read-only URL bar if
      and only if the page is in an iframe.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.marked.widget

      Element wrapper for the marked library.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.neon.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.neon.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CascadedAnimation
      <cascaded-animation> applies an animation on an array of elements with a delay between each.
      the delay defaults to 50ms.
      class  FadeInAnimation
      <fade-in-animation> animates the opacity of an element from 0 to 1.
      class  FadeOutAnimation
      <fade-out-animation> animates the opacity of an element from 1 to 0.
      class  HeroAnimation
      <hero-animation> is a shared element animation that scales and transform an element such that it
      appears to be shared between two pages.
      class  NeonAnimatable
      <neon-animatable> is a simple container element implementing Polymer.NeonAnimatableBehavior.
      class  NeonAnimatedPages
      Material design: Meaningful transitions
      class  OpaqueAnimation
      <opaque-animation> makes an element opacity:1 for the duration of the animation.
      class  ReverseRippleAnimation
      <reverse-ripple-animation> scales and transform an element such that it appears to ripple down from this element, to either
      a shared element, or a screen position.
      class  RippleAnimation
      <ripple-animation> scales and transform an element such that it appears to ripple from either
      a shared element, or from a screen position, to full screen.
      class  ScaleDownAnimation
      <scale-down-animation> animates the scale transform of an element from 1 to 0.
      class  ScaleUpAnimation
      <scale-up-animation> animates the scale transform of an element from 0 to 1.
      class  SlideDownAnimation
      <slide-down-animation> animates the transform of an element from none translateY(100%).
      The transformOrigin defaults to 50% 0.
      class  SlideFromBottomAnimation
      <slide-from-bottom-animation> animates the transform of an element from none to translateY(100%).
      The transformOrigin defaults to 50% 0.
      class  SlideFromLeftAnimation
      <slide-from-left-animation> animates the transform of an element from
      translateX(-100%) to none.
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideFromRightAnimation
      <slide-from-right-animation> animates the transform of an element from
      translateX(100%) to none.
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideFromTopAnimation
      <slide-from-top-animation> animates the transform of an element from translateY(-100%) to
      none.
      class  SlideLeftAnimation
      <slide-left-animation> animates the transform of an element from none to translateX(-100%).
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideRightAnimation
      <slide-right-animation> animates the transform of an element from none to translateX(100%).
      The transformOrigin defaults to 0 50%.
      class  SlideUpAnimation
      <slide-up-animation> animates the transform of an element from translateY(0) to
      translateY(-100%).
      class  TransformAnimation
      <transform-animation> animates a custom transform on an element.

      <paper-badge> is a circular text badge that is displayed on the top right

      class  PaperInputCharCounter
      <paper-input-char-counter> is a character counter for use with <paper-input-container>.
      class  PaperInputContainer
      <paper-input-container> is a container for a <label>, an <input is="iron-input"> or
      <textarea> and optional add-on elements such as an error message or character
      counter, used to implement Material Design text fields.
      class  PaperInputError
      <paper-input-error> is an error message for use with <paper-input-container>.
      class  PaperItem
      Material design: Lists
      class  PaperItemBody
      Use <paper-item-body> in a <paper-item> or <paper-icon-item> to make two- or
      three- line items.

      Material design: Progress & activity
      class  PaperStyles
      The <paper-styles> component provides simple ways to use Material Design CSS styles
      in your application.
      class  PaperSubmenu
      <paper-submenu> is a nested menu inside of a parent <paper-menu>.
      class  PaperTab
      paper-tab is styled to look like a tab.
      class  PaperTabs
      Material design: Tabs
      class  PaperTextarea

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.platinum.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.platinum.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PlatinumBluetoothCharacteristic
      The <platinum-bluetooth-characteristic> element allows you to read
      and write characteristics on nearby bluetooth devices       thanks to the
      young Web Bluetooth API.
      class  PlatinumBluetoothDevice
      The <platinum-bluetooth-device> element allows you to discover nearby
      bluetooth devices       thanks to the young Web Bluetooth API.
      class  PlatinumBluetoothService
      The <platinum-bluetooth-service> element is used in conjuction with
      the <platinum-bluetooth-characteristic> element to read and write
      characteristics on nearby bluetooth devices       thanks to the young Web
      Bluetooth API      .
      class  PlatinumHttpsRedirect
      The <platinum-https-redirect> element redirects the current page to HTTPS, unless the page is
      loaded from a web server running on localhost.
      class  PlatinumPushMessaging
      <platinum-push-messaging> sets up a push messaging subscription
      and allows you to define what happens when a push message is received.
      class  PlatinumSwCache
      The <platinum-sw-cache> element makes it easy to precache specific resources, perform runtime
      caching, and serve your cached resources when a network is unavailable.
      Under the hood, the sw-toolbox library is used
      for all the caching and request handling logic.
      <platinum-sw-cache> needs to be a child element of <platinum-sw-register>.
      A simple, yet useful configuration is
      class  PlatinumSwFetch
      The <platinum-sw-fetch> element creates custom fetch event
      handlers for given URL patterns.
      class  PlatinumSwImportScript
      The <platinum-sw-import-script> element is used to import a JavaScript file that is executed
      each time the service worker starts up.
      class  PlatinumSwOfflineAnalytics
      The <platinum-sw-offline-analytics> element registers a service worker handler to
      intercepts requests for Google Analytics pings.
      class  PlatinumSwRegister
      The <platinum-sw-register> element handles
      service worker
      registration, reflects the overall service worker state, and coordinates the configuration
      provided by other Service Worker Elements.
      <platinum-sw-register> is used as a parent element for child elements in the
      <platinum-sw-*> group.

    • Uses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin.widget

      Subclasses of PolymerWidget in com.vaadin.polymer.vaadin.widget 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  VaadinComboBox
      <vaadin-combo-box> is a combo box element combining a dropdown list with an
      input field for filtering the list of items.
      class  VaadinComboBoxLight
      <vaadin-combo-box-light> is a customizable version of the <vaadin-combo-box> providing
      only the dropdown functionality and leaving the input field definition to the user.
      class  VaadinComboBoxOverlay 
      class  VaadinComboBoxSharedStyles 
      class  VaadinContextMenu
      <vaadin-context-menu> is a component for contextual menus bound to UI elements.
      class  VaadinContextMenuOverlay 
      class  VaadinDatePicker
      <vaadin-date-picker> is a date selection field which includes a scrollable
      month calendar view.
      class  VaadinDatePickerLight
      <vaadin-date-picker-light> is a customizable version of the <vaadin-date-picker> providing
      only the scrollable month calendar view and leaving the input field definition to the user.
      class  VaadinDatePickerOverlay 
      class  VaadinDeviceDetector 
      class  VaadinGrid
      High quality data grid for showing large amounts of tabular data.
      class  VaadinIcons
      vaadin-icons is a set of 500+ icons which can be used together with Polymer’s iron-icon component.
      class  VaadinInfiniteScroller 
      class  VaadinMonthCalendar 
      class  VaadinSplitLayout
      <vaadin-split-layout> is a Polymer element implementing a split layout for two
      content elements with a draggable splitter between them.
      class  VaadinUpload
      <vaadin-upload> is a Polymer element for uploading multiple files with drag and drop support.
      class  VaadinUploadFile
      <vaadin-upload-file> element represents a file in the file list of <vaadin-upload>.
